data.name: AddInfoToPreExistingCase
data.value: Add information to a pre-existing case

data.name: ComplainantsOrRespondentsMayAddExtraInfoOrDocs
data.value:
The person who made the complaint and the organization or institution the complaint is against may add extra information or documents about the complaint with the Office of the Privacy Commissioner of Canada (OPC).

First, please submit your email address below. We will email you a unique link to access the form to add information or documents.

data.name: EmailPaAndPipeda
data.value:
This message has been automatically generated as the first step of making a privacy complaint to the Office of the Privacy Commissioner of Canada.

To continue, please fill out our online complaint form using this unique link.

Important information

  • For security reasons, you may only use the unique link once
  • If you haven’t entered anything for two hours, the session will end and your information will be deleted
  • If you go to another page or refresh the page using your browser’s navigation buttons, you may lose any information you have entered

If you have questions about our complaints process or our secure online form, please contact OPC’s Information Centre.

data.name: FilePAComplaint
data.value: File a PA Complaint

data.name: FilePIPEDAComplaint
data.value: File a PIPEDA Complaint

data.name: IfYouDoNotReceiveEmailContactOPC
data.value: If you do not receive the email within a few minutes, please contact OPC’s Information Centre.

data.name: OnlineComplaintForm
data.value: Online Complaint Form

data.name: PAComplaint
data.value: PA Complaint

data.name: PIPEDAComplaint

data.name: PleaseSubmitEmailFirst
data.value: First, please submit your email address below. We will email you a unique link to complete your complaint online.

data.name: RegistrationAddInfoOnComplaint
data.value: Registration—Document drop-off

data.name: RegistrationOnlineBusiness
data.value: Access our online privacy complaint form (private sector organization)

data.name: RegistrationOnlineFederal
data.value: Access our Online privacy complaint form (federal institution)

data.name: ThanksForSubmittingOnlineComplaint
data.value: Thanks for submitting your email address. You will receive an email from NePasRepondre-DoNotReply@priv.gc.ca with a link to complete your complaint online. If you use a security filter, make sure to set it to allow messages from this email address.

data.name: ThanksForSubmittingOnlineComplaintSuppInfo
data.value: You will receive an email with a unique link to add information NePasRepondre-DoNotReply@priv.gc.ca with a link to complete your complaint online. If you use a security filter, make sure to set it to allow messages from this email address.

data.name: ThankYou
data.value: Thank You!

data.name: UseBrowserForNavigation
data.value: Please use your browser navigation to go back to the previous page.

data.name: UseFormAgainstAnotherFederalInstitution
data.value: Use this form for the same privacy complaint against another public sector institution.

data.name: UseFormAgainstSameFederalInstitution
data.value: Use this form for additional privacy complaints against the same federal government institution.

data.name: EmailDropOff
data.value:
This message has been automatically generated as the first step of submitting documents or information relating to an existing privacy complaint already submitted to the Office of the Privacy Commissioner of Canada.

To continue, please use this unique link to the document drop-off.

Important information

  • For security reasons, you may only use the unique link once
  • If you haven’t entered anything for two hours, the session will end and your information will be deleted
  • If you go to another page or refresh the page using your browser’s navigation buttons, you may lose any information you have entered

If you have questions about our complaints process or our secure online document drop-off, please contact OPC’s Information Centre.

data.value: Submitting documents

data.value: Submit a privacy complaint

data.value: File a complaint about a federal institution

data.value: File a complaint about a business

data.name: ThisSiteRequiresJavascript
data.value: This site requires JavaScript. You might have difficulties doing certain actions. Please consider turning it on.
